item.title: Redmond’s Myla Hood and her trained wild horse are ready for
item.description: Redmond’s Myla Hood and her trained wild horse are ready for Teens and Oregon Mustangs challenge

item.title: The northern lights returned to the High Desert this week, a
item.description: The northern lights returned to the High Desert this week, as captured in this super time-lapse by Jim Hammond of Sisters and explained by our Chief Meteorologist John Carroll KTVZ.

item.title: PET PICS SWEEPSTAKES: Photo shoots with your favorite pet ca
item.description: PET PICS SWEEPSTAKES: Photo shoots with your favorite pet can take unexpected twists. Whatever the outcome, share yours with us for our Pet Pics Sweepstakes. The photo album and submission form is under the Contests tab at https://ktvz.com/pets/pet-pics-sweepstakes/...
